title: Jacob Knaack
profile_statement: I am a Software Engineer, Educator, and Curriculum Developer.  How can I help you today?
about_description: I build web services and teach software development in the Seattle Area.
I enjoy working with clients and stakeholders to create products that are exciting, and unique, while keeping real world objectives in focus.
I have a diverse background in Psychology, Research, Education, Software and Computer Science.
service_description: Here's what I can do for you.

services.name: Web Services
services.description: I build web services that are custom to your requirements.  Everything from User Interfaces on Desktop, Mobile, and Web Browser, all the way to micro and monolithic server software.

services.name: Education
services.description: I train individuals young and old in a wide range of skills. Skills like Programming and Engineering fundamentals, Data Structures and Algorithms, Web Development and Career Prep.

services.name: Product Development
services.description: I assist teams in planning and implementing solutions for potential customers. I work directly with customers and stakeholders to understand problems and requirements to produce great products.

project_description: Recent Projects I have contributed to.

experiences.title: Lead Instructor / Curriculum Developer
experiences.description: Teaching Web Development and Software Engineering to job seekers.  Created and maintained licensed curriculum from basic to advanced engineering skills.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: Assisted product team in developing their mobile app.  Worked with hardware engineers and designers to engineer services and interfaces for wearable technologies.

experiences.title: Platform Evangelist
experiences.description: Building apps to run on the Cosmic JS platform. Create content to evangelize products produced by Cosmic JS.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Working with small businesses to build and maintain software solutions for a wide range of needs.

contact_description: Let's connect!  If there is something I can help you with, please reach out.
